page.title: 04REDFANTS MANOR FARM
page.content: Peter Hull is the owner of Redfants Manor Farm.On arriving at the farm,we were shown round the barns and some of the machinery.Peter Hull has owned the farm,which has an acreage of 178.5 acres,since 1977.There is a variety of livestock, including horses, cows, bullocks, chickens and geese and a comprehensive selection of machinery. The most used pieces of machinery on the farm are the 2 tractors. The sprayer, harrow, combine and grass- cutter are used to a lesser degree. This year sees a good crop of corn, wheat, rape and peas; the last of which is grown as pig food. The 6O cows on the farm are used mainly for beef products.
